data.text: “Chifukwa chiyani Wamphamvuzonse sayikiratu nthawi yoti aweruze?
Anthu amasuntha miyala ya mʼmalire, kuti akuze dziko lawo;
Amalanda abulu a ana amasiye
Amachotsa mʼmisewu anthu osauka,
Amphawiwo amakhala ngati mbidzi mʼchipululu,
Iwo amakolola za mʼminda ya eni ake,
Amagona maliseche usiku wonse kusowa zovala;
Amavumbwa ndi mvula ya mʼmapiri
Amatsomphola mwana wamasiye wa ku bere;
Amphawi amangoyenda maliseche kusowa zovala;
Iwo amayenga mafuta a olivi mʼminda ya anthu oyipa;
Kubuwula kwa anthu amene akufa kumamveka kuchokera mu mzinda,
“Pali ena amene amakana kuwala,
Dzuwa likalowa, wopha anzake amadzuka
Munthu wachigololo amadikira chisisira;
Mbala zimathyola nyumba usiku,
Pakuti kwa onsewa mdima wandiweyani ndiye kuti kwawachera.
“Komatu iwowo ndi thovu loyandama pa madzi;
Monga momwe kutentha ndi chilala zimasungunulira madzi owundana
Mayi wowabereka amawayiwala,
Amachitira nkhanza mayi wosabala ndi mayi amene alibe mwana,
Koma Mulungu amawononga munthu wamphamvu mwa mphamvu zake;
Mulungu atha kuwalola kuti akhale mosatekeseka,
Kwa kanthawi kochepa oyipa amakwezedwa ndipo kenaka saonekanso;
